attributes.action: clarify the law to allow Scouts to carry knives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Scouting Association has introduced a policy that only allows Scouts to carry knives if there is a specific need.
The reason given was that the law is too confusing and risks legal trouble.
Clearly it is legal for Scouts to carry knives as they have been doing so for years, so we ask for you to clarify the law to allow Scouts to again have the right to carry knives, and allow the trust given to them by oath to be upheld.
